title: Just ?
body:
Hello,

Someone people know "Gamekit.com" but I have a question for staff of Riot :
- Is what Gamekit buys to you RP and Skin that they offerts ?



PS : Sorry for my english

replies.body: I haven't heard of this, but as a general rule of thumb we don't support third party sites or programs.  If you'd like an edge towards getting some free swag, I'd recommend using [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide)  instead.  Be wary of any phishing, malicious, and third party content that isn't directly supported by us.  Hope that helps!
